value.string:
request = container.REQUEST
 response = request.response
 
 # test with:
 # curl -k -i -F filename=node-2013-07-23-10-21-44.ocs -F file=@node-2013-07-23-10-21-44.ocs \
 # https://softinst41457.host.vifib.net/erp5/ERP5Site_uploadFusionInventory
 
 
 xml = request.get('file')
 if not xml:
 print 'no file uploaded'
 return printed
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 item_portal_type = 'Computer Item'
 
 filename = xml.filename
 payload = xml.read()
 
 # context.parse_ocs(payload)
 
 deviceid, logdate, bios, hardware, operating_system, other = context.parse_ocs(payload)
 
 print "Deviceid: %s" % deviceid
 
 cpu = other['CPUS'][0]
 
 network_interface = ','.join(set([
 o['DESCRIPTION']
 for o in other['NETWORKS']
 ]))
 
 ocskw = {
 'ocs': payload,
 'ocs_nodename': deviceid.split('-')[0],
 'ocs_logdate': logdate,
 'ocs_operating_system': operating_system['FULL_NAME'],
 'ocs_kernel_version': operating_system['KERNEL_VERSION'],
 'ocs_cpu': '%s x %s' % (cpu['CORE'], cpu['NAME']),
 'ocs_network_interface': network_interface, 
 }
 
 item = portal.computer_item_module.newContent(portal_type=item_portal_type,
 title='Computer %s' % filename.split('.')[0],
 **ocskw)
 
 print 'Item %s created.' % filename
 
 return printed
